src:
Inhalation Sciences får order värd 1,5 miljoner
Inhalation Sciences, som utvecklar avancerade laboratoriesystem, har fått en order på ett nytt Preciseinhale-system från befintlig kund i Asien. Ordervärdet ligger på 1,5 miljoner kronor.
01 Nov 2019, 07:54 by Nyhetsbyrån Direkt

text:
Inhalation Sciences receives orders worth 1.5 million
Inhalation Sciences, which develops advanced laboratory systems, has received an order for a new Precisehale system from an existing customer in Asia. The order value is SEK 1.5 million.
01 Nov 2019, 07:54 by News Agency Direct
